article_node.title: Here's the tea: Why AriZona may raise price of famous 99-cent cans
article_node.summary: AriZona Beverage Company, known for its 99-cent iced tea cans, may raise prices for the first time in over 30 years due to increased tariffs on aluminum and steel imposed by President Trump. The company's co-founder, Don Vultaggio, expressed concerns about the unfairness of the situation, as 80% of their materials are sourced domestically. Meanwhile, lululemon has launched a Summer Scores section featuring discounted Align Leggings, highlighting their popularity and affordability.
